TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BehaviorService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class BehaviorService Implements IDisposable
public ref class BehaviorService sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 在设计器中管理用户界面。

span.span: Manages user interface in the designer.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建后 ，它将在设计器框架上添加透明窗口。When the is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame. 然后，可以使用此窗口呈现称为对象的用户界面元素， 并捕获所有鼠标消息。The can then use this window to render user interface elements, called objects, as well as catch all mouse messages. 这样， 便可以控制设计器的行为。In this way, the can control designer behavior. 类支持 可推送对象的行为堆栈。The class supports a behavior stack, onto which objects can be pushed. 当通过透明窗口截获消息时， 可以将消息发送到 位于堆栈顶部的。When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the can send the message to the at the top of the stack. 这会启用不同的用户界面模式，具体取决于当前推送的 。This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed . 用于呈现所有 对象，例如选择边框、大小调整句柄和智能标记。The is used to render all objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags. 还控制许多设计时行为，如使用对齐线、拖动和选择。The also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [行为服务概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建您自己 的基于用户单击的类。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own based class that responds to user clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Occurs when the starts a drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 开始拖放操作之前立即引发事件。The raises the event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 装饰器窗口是位于设计器框架顶部的透明窗口。The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame. 使用此窗口 来截获所有消息。This window is used by the to intercept all messages. 它还充当用于绘制的统一画布 。It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 将 压到该行为堆栈上，并为该行为分配鼠标捕获。

span.span: Pushes a onto the behavior stack and assigns mouse capture to the behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 推送捕获行为通常是通过经过命中测试来完成的 。Pushing a capture behavior is often done through a hit-tested . 如果某个行为调用了 方法并丢失了鼠标捕获，则会调用该行为的 方法。If a behavior calls the method and mouse capture is lost, the behavior's method is called.
